# Status Badges for README

Add these badges to your main README.md file:

## Workflow Status Badges

```markdown
[![CI](https://github.com/raibid-labs/obi-mcp/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/raibid-labs/obi-mcp/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
[![Tests](https://github.com/raibid-labs/obi-mcp/actions/workflows/test.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/raibid-labs/obi-mcp/actions/workflows/test.yml)
[![Quick Check](https://github.com/raibid-labs/obi-mcp/actions/workflows/quick-check.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/raibid-labs/obi-mcp/actions/workflows/quick-check.yml)
```

## Combined Badge Section

Add this to your README.md header:

```markdown
# OBI MCP Server

[![CI](https://github.com/raibid-labs/obi-mcp/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/raibid-labs/obi-mcp/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
[![Tests](https://github.com/raibid-labs/obi-mcp/actions/workflows/test.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/raibid-labs/obi-mcp/actions/workflows/test.yml)
[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/raibid-labs/obi-mcp/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/raibid-labs/obi-mcp)
[![npm version](https://badge.fury.io/js/obi-mcp-server.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/js/obi-mcp-server)
[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
[![Node Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/node-%3E%3D18-brightgreen)](https://nodejs.org)

> Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for OpenTelemetry eBPF Instrumentation (OBI)
```
